Articles.Content:
Hello dear people of the KSP community, the finest Kerbal engineers (Me) have yet again built a new ship. But this time it's different.

They made a long-shot... (Drummroll) Instead of a spaceplane, they built a Munar Lander! Yes, indeed! It can make it into stable orbit,

then a stable Munar orbit. an then land on it! (Not sure if enough return fuel...)

Pros:

Mark 1 + 3 designed to almost perfection, this machine will take you to the mun!

Easy to land.

Stock

Cons:

Only one Kerbin can go on the vessel.

Download link (Mediafire): http://www./?6fley656y13ws9q

(Direct link below)
